using System.Collections.Generic;
using UnityEngine;
using UnityEngine.Events;

/// <summary>
/// Single cooldown tracker with ready/trigger cycle.
/// Generated by Unity-AI-Forge.
/// </summary>
public class {{CLASS_NAME}} : MonoBehaviour
{
    #region Settings

    [Header("Identity")]
    [SerializeField] private string cooldownId = "{{COOLDOWN_ID}}";

    [Header("Cooldown Settings")]
    [SerializeField] private float cooldownDuration = {{COOLDOWN_DURATION}};
    [SerializeField] private bool startReady = {{START_READY}};

    #endregion

    #region Events

    [Header("Events")]
    public UnityEvent OnCooldownTriggered = new UnityEvent();
    public UnityEvent OnCooldownReady = new UnityEvent();

    #endregion

    #region State

    private float timer;
    private bool isReady;

    #endregion

    #region Registry

    private static readonly Dictionary<string, {{CLASS_NAME}}> _registry =
        new Dictionary<string, {{CLASS_NAME}}>();

    public static {{CLASS_NAME}} FindById(string id)
    {
        return _registry.TryGetValue(id, out var c) ? c : null;
    }

    #endregion

    #region Properties

    public string CooldownId => cooldownId;
    public float CooldownDuration => cooldownDuration;
    public float Remaining => isReady ? 0f : Mathf.Max(0, timer);
    public float Progress => cooldownDuration > 0 ? 1f - Mathf.Clamp01(timer / cooldownDuration) : 1f;
    public bool IsReady => isReady;

    #endregion

    #region Lifecycle

    private void Awake()
    {
        isReady = startReady;
        timer = startReady ? 0f : cooldownDuration;
    }

    private void OnEnable()
    {
        if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(cooldownId))
            _registry[cooldownId] = this;
    }

    private void OnDisable()
    {
        if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(cooldownId))
            _registry.Remove(cooldownId);
    }

    private void Update()
    {
        if (!isReady)
        {
            timer -= Time.deltaTime;
            if (timer <= 0)
            {
                isReady = true;
                timer = 0;
                OnCooldownReady?.Invoke();
            }
        }
    }

    #endregion

    #region Public API

    public bool TryTrigger()
    {
        if (!isReady) return false;
        Trigger();
        return true;
    }

    public void Trigger()
    {
        isReady = false;
        timer = cooldownDuration;
        OnCooldownTriggered?.Invoke();
    }

    public void Reset()
    {
        isReady = true;
        timer = 0;
        OnCooldownReady?.Invoke();
    }

    public void SetDuration(float duration)
    {
        cooldownDuration = Mathf.Max(0, duration);
    }

    #endregion
}
